underweight prevalence among child participants in Toliary between January 1994 and June 
1996. This amounted to a 5.6 ppt/year decrease in malnutrition in Antananarivo and a 4 ppt/ 
year decrease in malnutrition in Toliary. The programme was deemed successful and was 
subsequently scaled up to cover all regions in the country through SEECALINE (see below).
